items.sentence: Everybody knows that he lost his leg in the war.
Everybody was anxious to know what had happened.
Is this the first time you\'ve tried doing this?
It doesn\'t cost much to eat at that restaurant.
It doesn\'t matter to me, but it matters to Tom.
It doesn\'t seem like Tom will go any time soon.
Tom accepted the nomination for class president.
Tom can come over to my place whenever he wants.
Tom can reach me at this number any time of day.
Tom can speak French better than the rest of us.
Tom is one of the best singers I\'ve ever heard.
I don\'t want Tom to drive. He\'s been drinking.
I don\'t want to start anything I can\'t finish.
I had no idea that Tom knew how to speak French.
Tom left the office without even saying goodbye.
Tom likes to rest on the couch after a long day.
Tom listens to the radio while eating breakfast.
I wish I could give you something, but I can\'t.
I haven\'t written any new poems in a long time.
I hope Tom does everything he\'s promised to do.
